subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Casper Ware scored a career-high 28 points as visiting Long Beach State (2-0) knocked off ninth-ranked Pittsburgh, 86-76. Ashton Gibbs led the Panthers (2-1) with 20 points and Nasir Robinson added 19.
snippet: Casper Ware scored a career-high 28 points as visiting Long Beach State (2-0) knocked off ninth-ranked Pittsburgh, 86-76. Ashton Gibbs led the Panthers (2-1) with 20 points and Nasir Robinson added 19.
